works better than.from sentence: Compared with CNN embedding : Emo2 Vec works better than CNN embedding on 14 / 18 datasets , giving 2.6 % absolute accuracy improvement for the sentiment task and 1.6 % absolute f1score improvement on the other tasks .

works.from sentence: Compared with SSWE : Emo2 Vec works much better on all datasets except SS - T datasets , which gives 3.3 % accuracy improvement and 4.7 % f 1 score improvement respectively on sentiment and other tasks .

predicting contextual words.from sentence: Since Emo2 Vec is not trained by predicting contextual words , it is weak on capturing synthetic and semantic meaning .

SOTA results.on: three datasets ( SE0714 , stress and tube tablet )

GloVe + Emo2 Vec.from sentence: GloVe + Emo2 Vec achieves better performances on SOTA results on three datasets ( SE0714 , stress and tube tablet ) and comparable result to SOTA on dataset Previous SOTA results

multi-task training.from sentence: It shows multi-task training helps to create better generalized word emotion representations than just using a single task .

gives.from sentence: On average , it gives 1.3 % improvement in accuracy for the sentiment task and 1.1 % improvement of f 1 - score on the other tasks .

solely using.from sentence: Here , we want to highlight that solely using a simple classifier with good word representation can achieve promising results .

GloVe+ DeepMoji , GloVe + Emo2 Vec.from sentence: Compared with GloVe+ DeepMoji , GloVe + Emo2 Vec achieves same or better results on 11 / 14 datasets , which on average gives 1.0 % improvement .

to detect.from sentence: Thus , to detect the corresponding emotion , more attention needs to be paid to words .
